entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:40 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
